All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminServiceClient
Service client to interact with the Admin Service API to fetch admin details.
AuthController
REST controller for handling authentication-related operations such as registration, login, email verification, password reset, and health check.
AuthService
Service interface for handling authentication and authorization operations, including user registration, login, email verification, and password management.
AuthServiceApplication
 
AuthServiceImpl
Service class for handling authentication operations, including registration, login, email verification, and password reset.
AuthServiceTest
 
DataInitializer
This class initializes user tokens in the database if none exist.
EmailAlreadyVerifiedException
Exception thrown when a user attempts to verify an email that is already verified.
EmailNotVerifiedException
Exception thrown when a user attempts to perform an action that requires email verification, but the email is not yet verified.
EmailRequestDTO
Data Transfer Object representing an email request, including the recipient, username, and user token required for the email content.
EmailSendFailedException
Exception thrown when an email fails to send due to some internal error.
EmailServiceClient
Service client to interact with the Email Service API to send emails.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for the application.
InvalidCredentialsException
Exception thrown when the provided credentials are invalid.
InvalidEmailException
Exception thrown when an email is invalid.
InvalidPasswordException
Exception thrown when a password is invalid.
InvalidRoleException
Exception thrown when an invalid role is encountered.
JwtRequestFilter
JwtRequestFilter is a custom filter responsible for JWT authentication.
JwtUtil
 
LoginRequestDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a login request, containing the username, password, and user role needed for authentication.
PlayerCreationResponseDTO
Data Transfer Object representing the response after a player is created.
PlayerServiceClient
Service client to interact with the Player Service API for managing player data.
PlayerServiceException
Exception thrown when there is an error in the player service.
RegisterRequestDTO
Data Transfer Object representing the details required for user registration, including username, password, email, and other personal information.
ResetPasswordRequestDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a request to reset a user's password.
SecurityConfig
 
TokenService
Service class responsible for handling user token operations such as generation, validation, and status updates.
UpdatePasswordRequestDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a request to update a user's password.
UserAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when a user already exists in the system.
UserDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a user with relevant information such as user ID, username, password, email, and role.
UserNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a user is not found in the system.
UserServiceException
 
UserToken
Represents a token used for authentication actions, such as email verification and password reset, in the MyChess application.
UserToken.TokenType
Enum representing the types of tokens available: EMAIL_VERIFICATION or PASSWORD_RESET.
UserTokenException
Exception thrown when there is an issue with a user token.
UserTokenRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on UserToken entities.
VerificationTokenException
